price: ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߞߎߡߊ߫ ߟߊ߲ߞߣߍߡߊߣߍ߲ ߟߐ߲߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߞߵߊ߬ ߟߐ߲߫ ߝߣߊ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߘߏ߲߰ ߠߊ߫
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡتُمُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: innahu yaʿlamu al-jahra mina al-qawli wayaʿlamu mā taktumūna
